members.name: Variable
members.docs: A variable like x, y, z

members.name: Constant
members.docs: A constant value

members.name: SequenceElement
members.docs: A sequence element like xₙ

members.name: GreaterThan
members.docs: Greater than: x > y

members.name: GreaterOrEqual
members.docs: Greater than or equal: x ≥ y

members.name: LessThan
members.docs: Less than: x < y

members.name: LessOrEqual
members.docs: Less than or equal: x ≤ y

members.name: Equal
members.docs: Equal: x = y

members.name: base_set
members.docs: The underlying set

members.name: properties
members.docs: Properties of the partial order

members.name: base_set
members.docs: The underlying set

members.name: properties
members.docs: Properties of the total order

members.name: Complete
members.docs: Whether the order is complete (every bounded subset has a supremum)

members.name: HasMinimum
members.docs: Whether the order has a minimum element

members.name: HasMaximum
members.docs: Whether the order has a maximum element

members.name: Dense
members.docs: Whether the order is dense (between any two elements there is another)

members.name: Discrete
members.docs: Whether the order is discrete (every element has immediate neighbors)

members.name: WellFounded
members.docs: Whether the order is well-founded (no infinite descending chains)

members.name: poset
members.docs: The underlying partially ordered set

members.name: properties
members.docs: Properties of the lattice

members.name: Distributive
members.docs: Whether the lattice is distributive: x∧(y∨z) = (x∧y)∨(x∧z)

members.name: Modular
members.docs: Whether the lattice is modular: x≤z implies x∨(y∧z) = (x∨y)∧z

members.name: Complemented
members.docs: Whether the lattice is complemented: every element has a complement

members.name: Bounded
members.docs: Whether the lattice is bounded: has top and bottom elements

members.name: Complete
members.docs: Whether the lattice is complete: every subset has sup and inf

members.name: lattice
members.docs: The underlying lattice

members.name: properties
members.docs: Properties of the Boolean algebra

members.name: Complete
members.docs: Whether the algebra is complete (every subset has sup and inf)

members.name: Atomic
members.docs: Whether the algebra is atomic (every element is sup of atoms below it)

members.name: Finite
members.docs: Whether the algebra is finite
